definitions.definition: Related to the abdomen or stomach .
On the front side of the human body, or the corresponding surface of an animal, usually the lower surface.
On or relating to the sole of the foot or the palmar surface of the hand.
On the lower side of the brain.

main_definition: Related to the abdomen or stomach .
secondary_definitions: ( anatomy ) On the front side of the human body, or the corresponding surface of an animal, usually the lower surface.
( anatomy ) On or relating to the sole of the foot or the palmar surface of the hand.
( neuroanatomy ) On the lower side of the brain.
